body:
Fixes #19546 

Packages I would like to have tested before merging:

- [x] tcl (%apple-clang and %gcc)
- [x] tk (%apple-clang and %gcc)
- [x] tix (%gcc but not %apple-clang)
- [x] tcl-itcl
- [x] tcl-tcllib
- [x] tcl-tclxml (%gcc but not %apple-clang)
- [x] environment-modules
- [x] lmod
- [x] python+tkinter
- [ ] r+X (build failure, even on develop: #19788)
- [x] ruby
- [x] expect (%gcc but not %apple-clang: #19767)
- [x] glib

@andymwood can you help test this on your system?
title: Don't use prefix.lib in tcl/tk/glib/etc
